00052 /*
00053  * Can this object read the file
00054  */
00055 bool CalvinCELDataAdapter::CanReadFile()
00056 {
00057         CelFileReader reader;
00058         try
00059         {
00060                 reader.Read(calvinCel);
00061         }
00062         catch(...)
00063         {
00064                 return false;
00065         }
00066 
00067         return true;
00068 }

00099 /*
00100  */
00101 std::wstring CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetParams()
00102 {
00103         std::wstring params;
00104         ParameterNameValueTypeVector algParams;
00105         calvinCel.GetAlgorithmParameters(algParams);
00106         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = algParams.begin(); ii!= algParams.end(); ++ii)
00107         {
00108                 if (ii != algParams.begin())
00109                         params += L";";
00110                 params += ii->GetName();
00111                 params += L":";
00112                 params += ii->ToString();
00113         }
00114         return params;
00115 }
00116 
00117 /*
00118  */
00119 std::wstring CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetAlgorithmParameter(const wchar_t *tag)
00120 {
00121         std::wstring result;
00122         ParameterNameValueType param;
00123         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(tag, param))
00124         {
00125                 result = param.ToString();
00126         }
00127         return result;
00128 }

00130 /*
00131  */
00132 std::wstring CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetAlgorithmParameterTag(int index)
00133 {
00134         ParameterNameValueTypeVector algParams;
00135         calvinCel.GetAlgorithmParameters(algParams);
00136 
00137         std::wstring result;
00138         try
00139         {
00140                 result = algParams.at(index).GetName();
00141         }
00142         catch(...)
00143         {
00144         }
00145         return result;
00146 }

00164 /*
00165  */
00166 void CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetParameters(FusionTagValuePairTypeList& values)
00167 {
00168         ParameterNameValueTypeVector algParams;
00169         calvinCel.GetAlgorithmParameters(algParams);
00170         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = algParams.begin(); ii!= algParams.end(); ++ii)
00171         {
00172                 FusionTagValuePairType ft;
00173                 ft.Tag = ii->GetName();
00174                 ft.Value = ii->ToString();
00175                 ft.DetailedType() = *ii;
00176                 values.push_back(ft);
00177         }
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*
00181  */
00182 std::wstring CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetDatHeader()
00183 {
00184         std::wstring datHeader;
00185 
00186         //GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end; 
00187         GenericDataHeader* gdh = calvinCel.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindParent(SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00188         if (gdh)
00189         {
00190                 // found the right header, now look for the parameter
00191                 ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00192                 if (gdh->FindNameValParam(DAT_HEADER_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00193                 {
00194                         if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType)
00195                                 datHeader = nvt.GetValueText();
00196                 }
00197                 else if (gdh->FindNameValParam(PARTIAL_DAT_HEADER_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00198                 {
00199                         if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType)
00200                         {
00201                                 std::wstring partialDatHeader = nvt.GetValueText();
00202 
00203                                 u_int16_t min = 0;
00204                                 u_int16_t max = 0;
00205 
00206                                 // Find the max and min parameters and append to the string.
00207                                 if (gdh->FindNameValParam(MAX_PIXEL_INTENSITY_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00208                                 {
00209                                         if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type)
00210                                                 max = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00211                                 }
00212 
00213                                 if (gdh->FindNameValParam(MIN_PIXEL_INTENSITY_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00214                                 {
00215                                         if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type)
00216                                                 min = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00217                                 }
00218 
00219                                 wchar_t buf[30]=L"";
00220                                 FormatString2(buf, 30, L"[%d..%d]", min, max);
00221                                 datHeader = buf;
00222                                 datHeader += partialDatHeader;
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         return datHeader;
00227 }
00228 
00229 /*
00230  */
00231 int CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetCellMargin()
00232 {
00233         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00234         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(CELLMARGIN_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00235         {
00236                 switch(nvt.GetParameterType())
00237                 {
00238                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00239                         return nvt.GetValueInt32();
00240                         break;
00241                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00242                         return (int)nvt.GetValueInt16();
00243                         break;
00244                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00245                         return (int)nvt.GetValueInt8();
00246                         break;
00247                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00248                         return (int)nvt.GetValueUInt32();
00249                         break;
00250                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00251                         return (int)nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00252                         break;
00253                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00254                         return (int)nvt.GetValueUInt8();
00255                         break;
00256                 case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00257                         return (int)atoi(nvt.GetValueAscii().c_str());
00258                 default:
00259                         return 0;
00260                         break;
00261                 }
00262         }
00263   return 0;
00264 }

00280 /*
00281  * Get the grid coordinates.
00282  */
00283 affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetGridCorners()
00284 {
00285         affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords zeroGrid;
00286         affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords grid;
00287         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00288 
00289         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDULX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00290         {
00291                 grid.upperleft.x = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00292         }
00293         else
00294         {
00295                 return zeroGrid;
00296         }
00297 
00298         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDULY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00299         {
00300                 grid.upperleft.y = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00304                 return zeroGrid;
00305         }
00306 
00307         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDURX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00308         {
00309                 grid.upperright.x = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00310         }
00311         else
00312         {
00313                 return zeroGrid;
00314         }
00315 
00316         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDURY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00317         {
00318                 grid.upperright.y = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00319         }
00320         else
00321         {
00322                 return zeroGrid;
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLRX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00326         {
00327                 grid.lowerright.x = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00328         }
00329         else
00330         {
00331                 return zeroGrid;
00332         }
00333 
00334         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLRY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00335         {
00336                 grid.lowerright.y = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00337         }
00338         else
00339         {
00340                 return zeroGrid;
00341         }
00342 
00343         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLLX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00344         {
00345                 grid.lowerleft.x = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00346         }
00347         else
00348         {
00349                 return zeroGrid;
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (calvinCel.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLLY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00353         {
00354                 grid.lowerleft.y = nvt.GetValueFloat();
00355         }
00356         else
00357         {
00358                 return zeroGrid;
00359         }
00360         return grid;
00361 
00362 }

00364 // Index/position conversions
00365 /*
00366  */
00367 int CalvinCELDataAdapter::IndexToX(int index)
00368 {
00369         return index % calvinCel.GetCols();
00370 }
00371 
00372 /*
00373  */
00374 int CalvinCELDataAdapter::IndexToY(int index)
00375 {
00376         return index / calvinCel.GetCols();
00377 }
00378 
00379 /*
00380  */
00381 int CalvinCELDataAdapter::XYToIndex(int x, int y)
00382 {
00383         return y*calvinCel.GetCols() + x;
00384 }

00386 // Accessors for intensity information.
00387 /*
00388  */
00389 void CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetEntry(int index, FusionCELFileEntryType &entry)
00390 {
00391         float intensity;
00392         float stdev;
00393         int16_t numPixels; 
00394         bool outlier, masked;
00395         calvinCel.GetData(index, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked);
00396 
00397         entry.Intensity = (float)intensity;
00398         entry.Stdv = stdev;
00399         entry.Pixels = numPixels;
00400 }
00401 
00402 /*
00403  */
00404 void CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetEntry(int x, int y, FusionCELFileEntryType &entry)
00405 {
00406         int index = XYToIndex(x,y);
00407 
00408         float intensity;
00409         float stdev;
00410         int16_t numPixels; 
00411         bool outlier, masked;
00412         calvinCel.GetData(index, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked);
00413 
00414         entry.Intensity = (float)intensity;
00415         entry.Stdv = stdev;
00416         entry.Pixels = numPixels;
00417 }

00419 /*
00420  */
00421 float CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetIntensity(int index)
00422 {
00423   // allocate a vector, fill it with one item
00424         FloatVector v;
00425         calvinCel.GetIntensities(index, 1, v);
00426   // and return that one item.
00427         return v.at(0);
00428 }
00429 
00430 /*
00431  */
00432 int CalvinCELDataAdapter::GetIntensities(int index,std::vector<float>& intensities)
00433 {
00434   // Pass the vector along to get filled.
00435         calvinCel.GetIntensities(index, intensities.size(), intensities);
00436   // no errors for now.
00437   return 0;
00438 }

00488 // Accessors for the mask/outlier flags
00489 /*
00490  */
00491 bool CalvinCELDataAdapter::IsMasked(int x, int y)
00492 {
00493         BoolVector v;
00494         int32_t index = XYToIndex(x, y);
00495         if (calvinCel.GetMasked(index, 1, v))
00496                 return v.at(0);
00497         else
00498                 return false;
00499 }
